channel.title: trigonometry on stemformulas
channel.description: Recent content in trigonometry on stemformulas

item.title: Sine Law
item.description: A formula relating the sides and angles of every triangle.

item.title: Snell's Law
item.description: The formula relating the angles of incidence and refraction to the refractive indices of the two media.

item.title: De Moivre's Theorem
item.description: Formula for a equivalent form of a complex number raised to a power.

item.title: Double Angle Trig Identities
item.description: Formulas expanding the trigonometric functions of double angles.

item.title: Trig Angle Sum/Difference Identities
item.description: Formulas for the trigonometric functions of the sum and difference of angles.

item.title: Cosine Law
item.description: The formula relating the sides and angles of every triangle.

item.title: Pythagorean Trig Identities
item.description: A few identities involving sine, cosine, and tangent.

item.title: Pythagorean Theorem
item.description: Formula relating the lengths of the sides of a right triangle

item.title: Euler's Identity/Formula
item.description: One of the most amazing formulas in mathematics.

item.title: Trig functions in terms of e
item.description: Common trig functions in terms of e
